title: Script similar to Brewmeister... plus another
content:
Hi everyone. I have been looking for these fonts for days - and I realize they could be hand drawn.  
I have come close, but not quite on the script ("Jeans")... Not at all on the display lettering "Bar & Grill"

Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725015504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_6254(1)_6625.jpg)
author: LadyGorms
